GE09ram_03pu:3: yathā pradīptaṃ durdharṣaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam // Ram_3,1.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:5: pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,1.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:7: samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam // Ram_3,1.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:8: āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:10: puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā /
GE09ram_03pu:13: puṇyaiś ca niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ // Ram_3,1.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:17: abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,1.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:19: abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,1.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:20: te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:24: vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva /
GE09ram_03pu:25: āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:29: ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:30: mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:33: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ // Ram_3,1.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:35: rājā tasmād varān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ // Ram_3,1.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:37: nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,1.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:39: rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ // Ram_3,1.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:40: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:41: anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan // Ram_3,1.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:45: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata // Ram_3,2.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:49: lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_3,2.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:53: bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,2.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:56: trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa /
GE09ram_03pu:57: saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat // Ram_3,2.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:59: sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm // Ram_3,2.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:61: sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,2.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:65: kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,2.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:67: ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,2.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:69: iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bhāryā bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:70: yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe // Ram_3,2.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:73: sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_3,2.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:74: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām /
GE09ram_03pu:75: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,2.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:79: yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ varavṛtaṃ ca yat /
GE09ram_03pu:80: kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,2.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:81: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:83: adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā // Ram_3,2.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:84: parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me /
GE09ram_03pu:85: pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā // Ram_3,2.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:87: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan // Ram_3,2.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:88: anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:89: mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapyase // Ram_3,2.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:91: virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,2.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:92: rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha /
GE09ram_03pu:93: taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale // Ram_3,2.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:94: mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi /
GE09ram_03pu:95: vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:96: athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:97: ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,3.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:98: tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:101: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān // Ram_3,3.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:102: tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam /
GE09ram_03pu:103: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava // Ram_3,3.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:104: putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā /
GE09ram_03pu:105: virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,3.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:106: tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā /
GE09ram_03pu:109: tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade // Ram_3,3.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:112: kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam /
GE09ram_03pu:113: raṇe samprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,3.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:114: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān /
GE09ram_03pu:115: suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha // Ram_3,3.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:123: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_3,3.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:124: tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha /
GE09ram_03pu:125: rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,3.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:128: idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham // Ram_3,3.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:129: kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:130: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,3.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:131: abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum /
GE09ram_03pu:132: tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśravaṇena hi // Ram_3,3.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:133: prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:134: yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge // Ram_3,3.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:135: tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:136: iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha // Ram_3,3.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:139: bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,3.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:142: taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati /
GE09ram_03pu:143: avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja // Ram_3,3.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:145: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ // Ram_3,3.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:146: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:149: virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam // Ram_3,3.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:150: tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:151: vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva //
GE09ram_03pu:152: hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:153: tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:154: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,4. 1 //
GE09ram_03pu:155: kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:159: samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam // Ram_3,4. 4 //
GE09ram_03pu:163: tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4. 6 //
GE09ram_03pu:169: gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani // Ram_3,4. 9 //
GE09ram_03pu:171: antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire // Ram_3,4. 10 //
GE09ram_03pu:172: dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:173: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:174: antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam // Ram_3,4. 11 //
GE09ram_03pu:175: ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham /
GE09ram_03pu:176: śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,4. 12 //
GE09ram_03pu:179: etaddhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā /
GE09ram_03pu:181: ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:182: yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe // Ram_3,4. 15 //
GE09ram_03pu:183: tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:186: śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt // Ram_3,4. 17 //
GE09ram_03pu:187: ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_03pu:188: niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati // Ram_3,4. 18 //
GE09ram_03pu:189: jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam /
GE09ram_03pu:190: karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram // Ram_3,4. 19 //
GE09ram_03pu:191: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasam /
GE09ram_03pu:192: rathena hariyuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,4. 20 //
GE09ram_03pu:195: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:197: tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:198: śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat // Ram_3,4. 23 //
GE09ram_03pu:199: mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati /
GE09ram_03pu:200: jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4. 24 //
GE09ram_03pu:202: brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim // Ram_3,4. 25 //
GE09ram_03pu:204: akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:205: brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān // Ram_3,4. 26 //
GE09ram_03pu:207: ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,4. 27 //
GE09ram_03pu:209: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,4. 28 //
GE09ram_03pu:211: śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_3,4. 29 //
GE09ram_03pu:212: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam /
GE09ram_03pu:213: ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati // Ram_3,4. 30 //
GE09ram_03pu:214: eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām /
GE09ram_03pu:215: yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ // Ram_3,4. 31 //
GE09ram_03pu:216: tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit /
GE09ram_03pu:218: tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:219: jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam // Ram_3,4. 33 //
GE09ram_03pu:222: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:223: devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata // Ram_3,4. 35 //
GE09ram_03pu:224: sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha /
GE09ram_03pu:225: pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha //
GE09ram_03pu:229: aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ pattrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:236: śarabhaṅgāśrame rāmam abhijagmuś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:237: abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_03pu:240: pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva // Ram_3,5.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:241: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca /
GE09ram_03pu:242: pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ // Ram_3,5.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:244: arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_3,5.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:245: adharmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:246: yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat // Ram_3,5.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:247: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva /
GE09ram_03pu:248: nityayuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_3,5.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:249: prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm /
GE09ram_03pu:250: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate // Ram_3,5.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:251: yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:252: tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // Ram_3,5.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:254: tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam // Ram_3,5.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:256: hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane // Ram_3,5.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:258: citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,5.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:259: evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinām /
GE09ram_03pu:260: kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,5.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:261: tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:262: paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ // Ram_3,5.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:263: etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām /
GE09ram_03pu:264: idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:265: naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinām // Ram_3,5.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:267: tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:268: tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān // Ram_3,5.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:269: dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ dharme dhṛtātmā saha lakṣmaṇena /
GE09ram_03pu:270: tapodhanaiś cāpi sabhājyavṛttaḥ sutīkṣṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ // Ram_3,5.21
GE09ram_03pu:271: rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:272: sutīkṣṇasyāśramapadaṃ jagāma saha tair dvijaiḥ // Ram_3,6.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:273: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:274: dadarśa vipulaṃ śailaṃ mahāmegham ivonnatam // Ram_3,6.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:275: tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:276: kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_3,6.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:280: rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇaṃ vidhivat tapovṛddham abhāṣata // Ram_3,6.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:281: rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:282: tan mābhivada dharmajña maharṣe satyavikrama // Ram_3,6.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:283: sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_03pu:284: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,6.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:285: svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:286: āśramo 'yaṃ tvayākrāntaḥ sanātha iva sāmpratam // Ram_3,6.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:288: devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale // Ram_3,6.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:291: sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā // Ram_3,6.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:293: matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,6.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:295: pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,6.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:297: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,6.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:300: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:301: abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ // Ram_3,6.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:302: ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha /
GE09ram_03pu:306: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:307: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,6.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:310: bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:311: etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye // Ram_3,6.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:312: tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat /
GE09ram_03pu:313: anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat // Ram_3,6.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:314: tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām /
GE09ram_03pu:315: tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya //
GE09ram_03pu:317: pariṇāmya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata // Ram_3,7.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:318: utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:320: atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:321: kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane // Ram_3,7.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:323: sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,7.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:324: sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:325: āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ // Ram_3,7.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:329: dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ // Ram_3,7.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:332: tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:333: vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,7.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:335: gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,7.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:336: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:339: eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām // Ram_3,7.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:346: gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu /
GE09ram_03pu:347: āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama // Ram_3,7.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:348: evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:349: pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtvā prasthātum upacakrame // Ram_3,7.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:351: dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ // Ram_3,7.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:352: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpau cādāya sasvanau /
GE09ram_03pu:353: niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,7.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:355: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_3,8.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:356: ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān /
GE09ram_03pu:357: nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha // Ram_3,8.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:358: trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta /
GE09ram_03pu:360: paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā // Ram_3,8.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:361: mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:363: tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:364: tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana // Ram_3,8.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:366: nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam // Ram_3,8.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:368: ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām // Ram_3,8.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:369: etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:370: prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,8.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:371: tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:372: tvadvṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam // Ram_3,8.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:373: na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_03pu:374: kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama // Ram_3,8.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:375: tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:376: dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam // Ram_3,8.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:378: samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejo- balam ucchrayate bhṛśam // Ram_3,8.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:379: purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:380: kasmiṃścid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije // Ram_3,8.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:381: tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:384: sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_3,8.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:386: vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,8.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:387: yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:388: na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ // Ram_3,8.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:389: nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:390: cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam // Ram_3,8.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:392: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ // Ram_3,8.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:393: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye /
GE09ram_03pu:394: na kathaṃcana sā kāryā gṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā // Ram_3,8.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:395: buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān /
GE09ram_03pu:396: aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye // Ram_3,8.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:398: dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam // Ram_3,8.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:399: kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:400: vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām // Ram_3,8.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:402: punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi // Ram_3,8.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:403: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrūśvaśurayor mama /
GE09ram_03pu:404: yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ // Ram_3,8.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:405: dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:406: dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat // Ram_3,8.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:407: ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:408: prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham // Ram_3,8.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:409: nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane /
GE09ram_03pu:410: sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ // Ram_3,8.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:411: strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:412: vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa // Ram_3,8.29
GE09ram_03pu:413: vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā /
GE09ram_03pu:414: śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm // Ram_3,9.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:415: hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:416: kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje // Ram_3,9.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:417: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:418: kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti // Ram_3,9.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:420: māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,9.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:422: na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,9.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:423: kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane /
GE09ram_03pu:426: asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ // Ram_3,9.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:427: mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam /
GE09ram_03pu:428: kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam // Ram_3,9.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:429: prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā /
GE09ram_03pu:431: kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau // Ram_3,9.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:432: sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:434: arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati // Ram_3,9.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:436: dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,9.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:438: gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,9.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:440: cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam // Ram_3,9.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:442: tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ // Ram_3,9.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:444: rakṣa nas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane // Ram_3,9.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:445: mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam /
GE09ram_03pu:447: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam /
GE09ram_03pu:448: munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā // Ram_3,9.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:449: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:450: na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,9.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:451: tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam /
GE09ram_03pu:452: anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,9.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:453: mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:454: parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate /
GE09ram_03pu:455: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane // Ram_3,9.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:456: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā sītāṃ priyāṃ maithilarājaputrīm /
GE09ram_03pu:457: rāmo dhanuṣmān saha lakṣmaṇena jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni // Ram_3,9.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:458: agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā /
GE09ram_03pu:459: pṛṣṭhatas tu dhanuṣpāṇir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha // Ram_3,10.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:460: tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:461: nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:463: sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ // Ram_3,10.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:465: mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:466: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare /
GE09ram_03pu:467: dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam // Ram_3,10.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:471: gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaścana dṛśyate // Ram_3,10.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:472: tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:473: muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_3,10.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:474: idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune /
GE09ram_03pu:475: kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām // Ram_3,10.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:476: tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:477: prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,10.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:479: nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā // Ram_3,10.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:480: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:484: asmākaṃ kasyacit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ // Ram_3,10.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:485: tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:489: tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañca muneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:490: taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham // Ram_3,10.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:492: ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam // Ram_3,10.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:496: rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,10.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:499: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:500: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale // Ram_3,10.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:502: jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām // Ram_3,10.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:503: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit /
GE09ram_03pu:504: kvacit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:505: kvacic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kvacit /
GE09ram_03pu:506: aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:507: trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:508: tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai /
GE09ram_03pu:509: ramataś cānukūlyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa // Ram_3,10.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:510: parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:511: sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha // Ram_3,10.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:512: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:513: tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃcit kālam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,10.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:515: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt // Ram_3,10.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:517: vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam // Ram_3,10.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:518: na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā /
GE09ram_03pu:519: kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,10.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:520: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:523: yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam // Ram_3,10.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:524: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:526: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:527: agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava // Ram_3,10.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:528: diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām /
GE09ram_03pu:529: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ // Ram_3,10.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:530: yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:531: dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ // Ram_3,10.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:536: tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām /
GE09ram_03pu:537: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_3,10.39 //
GE09ram_03pu:540: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha // Ram_3,10.40 //
GE09ram_03pu:542: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim /
GE09ram_03pu:543: adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,10.41 //
GE09ram_03pu:544: iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:545: pratasthe 'gastyam uddiśya sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.42 //
GE09ram_03pu:547: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ // Ram_3,10.43 //
GE09ram_03pu:549: idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,10.44 //
GE09ram_03pu:551: agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.45 //
GE09ram_03pu:552: yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:553: saṃnatāḥ phalabhāreṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ // Ram_3,10.46 //
GE09ram_03pu:554: pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:556: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:557: lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaiḍūryavarcasaḥ // Ram_3,10.48 //
GE09ram_03pu:561: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_3,10.50 //
GE09ram_03pu:562: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:563: agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,10.51 //
GE09ram_03pu:565: yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.52 //
GE09ram_03pu:566: ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:567: bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau // Ram_3,10.53 //
GE09ram_03pu:568: dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan /
GE09ram_03pu:569: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.54 //
GE09ram_03pu:570: bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:571: tān dvijān bhojayāmāsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Ram_3,10.55 //
GE09ram_03pu:573: vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan // Ram_3,10.56 //
GE09ram_03pu:574: tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan /
GE09ram_03pu:575: bhittvā bhittvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat // Ram_3,10.57 //
GE09ram_03pu:579: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // Ram_3,10.59 //
GE09ram_03pu:580: tataḥ sampannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam /
GE09ram_03pu:582: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam /
GE09ram_03pu:583: abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ // Ram_3,10.61 //
GE09ram_03pu:584: kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:585: bhrātus te meṣarūpasya gatasya yamasādanam // Ram_3,10.62 //
GE09ram_03pu:586: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam /
GE09ram_03pu:587: pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,10.63 //
GE09ram_03pu:591: viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,10.65 //
GE09ram_03pu:594: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_03pu:596: samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:597: nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca // Ram_3,10.68 //
GE09ram_03pu:599: bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,10.69 //
GE09ram_03pu:600: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām /
GE09ram_03pu:601: āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam // Ram_3,10.70 //
GE09ram_03pu:603: yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan // Ram_3,10.71 //
GE09ram_03pu:604: nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān /
GE09ram_03pu:605: ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān // Ram_3,10.72 //
GE09ram_03pu:607: dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān // Ram_3,10.73 //
GE09ram_03pu:609: mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān // Ram_3,10.74 //
GE09ram_03pu:612: snigdhapattrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:614: agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:619: dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.79 //
GE09ram_03pu:621: dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate // Ram_3,10.80 //
GE09ram_03pu:623: tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ // Ram_3,10.81 //
GE09ram_03pu:624: nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:625: prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,10.82 //
GE09ram_03pu:627: saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaḥ śailo na vardhate // Ram_3,10.83 //
GE09ram_03pu:630: eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām /
GE09ram_03pu:631: asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati // Ram_3,10.85 //
GE09ram_03pu:633: śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho // Ram_3,10.86 //
GE09ram_03pu:634: atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:636: nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:637: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāmavṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ // Ram_3,10.88 //
GE09ram_03pu:638: atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_03pu:641: tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,10.90 //
GE09ram_03pu:642: yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:643: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ // Ram_3,10.91 //
GE09ram_03pu:645: nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.92 //
GE09ram_03pu:647: agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_3,11.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:648: rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī /
GE09ram_03pu:649: rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā // Ram_3,11.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:650: lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:651: anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // Ram_3,11.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:652: te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt /
GE09ram_03pu:653: draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām // Ram_3,11.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:658: putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:659: praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā // Ram_3,11.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:661: yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi // Ram_3,11.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:662: tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:663: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,11.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:664: diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:665: manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati // Ram_3,11.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:667: praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ // Ram_3,11.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:668: evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_03pu:670: tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:671: kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam // Ram_3,11.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:673: darśayāmāsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām // Ram_3,11.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:674: taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan /
GE09ram_03pu:678: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:679: viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,11.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:680: somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:681: dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca // Ram_3,11.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:682: tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat /
GE09ram_03pu:684: abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // Ram_3,11.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:685: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:688: jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_3,11.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:689: abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:690: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,11.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:692: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:693: agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:694: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau // Ram_3,11.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:696: uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam // Ram_3,11.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:698: duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet // Ram_3,11.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:700: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ // Ram_3,11.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:701: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:702: pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:706: datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_3,11.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:707: sampūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:709: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān /
GE09ram_03pu:710: ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām // Ram_3,11.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:711: tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada /
GE09ram_03pu:712: jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā // Ram_3,11.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:713: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham /
GE09ram_03pu:714: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,11.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:715: rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:716: abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:718: vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā // Ram_3,12.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:719: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā /
GE09ram_03pu:721: yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru /
GE09ram_03pu:722: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī // Ram_3,12.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:723: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana /
GE09ram_03pu:724: samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca // Ram_3,12.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:727: iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitā /
GE09ram_03pu:728: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī // Ram_3,12.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:729: alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:730: vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,12.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:731: evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:732: uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam // Ram_3,12.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:735: kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:736: yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham // Ram_3,12.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:738: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,12.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:740: deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ // Ram_3,12.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:742: ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan // Ram_3,12.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:743: vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha /
GE09ram_03pu:744: tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,12.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:745: hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:746: iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane // Ram_3,12.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:747: ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti /
GE09ram_03pu:748: sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:749: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:750: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:752: viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca // Ram_3,12.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:753: bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:754: api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi // Ram_3,12.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:755: etad ālakṣyate vīra madhūkānāṃ mahad vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:759: agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:762: tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:763: gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau /
GE09ram_03pu:764: yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau //
GE09ram_03pu:767: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:768: menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // Ram_3,13.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:769: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva /
GE09ram_03pu:770: uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,13.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:771: sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayāmāsa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:772: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // Ram_3,13.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:773: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:776: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // Ram_3,13.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:778: śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // Ram_3,13.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:779: sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:780: pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // Ram_3,13.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:782: kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // Ram_3,13.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:783: prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:784: ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:786: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danum api ca kālakām // Ram_3,13.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:787: tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api /
GE09ram_03pu:788: tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,13.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:790: aditis tanmanā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca // Ram_3,13.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:791: kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan /
GE09ram_03pu:792: adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:793: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_03pu:794: ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_3,13.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:796: danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:798: krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // Ram_3,13.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:800: ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // Ram_3,13.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:801: śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:802: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:803: cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī /
GE09ram_03pu:804: śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā // Ram_3,13.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:806: mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // Ram_3,13.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:807: mātaṃgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:809: apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama /
GE09ram_03pu:810: ṛkṣāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // Ram_3,13.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:811: tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām /
GE09ram_03pu:812: tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ // Ram_3,13.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:813: haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:814: golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // Ram_3,13.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:815: mātaṃgyās tv atha mātaṃgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:816: diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam // Ram_3,13.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:817: tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata /
GE09ram_03pu:818: rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,13.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:819: rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān /
GE09ram_03pu:820: surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān // Ram_3,13.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:822: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha // Ram_3,13.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:823: mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:824: ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ // Ram_3,13.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:826: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā // Ram_3,13.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:827: kadrūr nāgaṃ sahasraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam /
GE09ram_03pu:828: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca // Ram_3,13.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:829: tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt sampātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:830: jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:832: sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // Ram_3,13.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:833: jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat /
GE09ram_03pu:834: pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:835: sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:836: jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:838: uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,14.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:839: āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:841: sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi /
GE09ram_03pu:842: āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ // Ram_3,14.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:843: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:846: saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam // Ram_3,14.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:847: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:848: sītāsamakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,14.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:849: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite /
GE09ram_03pu:850: svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada // Ram_3,14.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:853: sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi /
GE09ram_03pu:854: hastau gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,14.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:855: ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:856: ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi // Ram_3,14.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:858: adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā // Ram_3,14.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:860: iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā // Ram_3,14.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:864: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:865: sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:867: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:868: nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ // Ram_3,14.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:869: cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api /
GE09ram_03pu:870: puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:871: candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api /
GE09ram_03pu:873: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam /
GE09ram_03pu:874: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,14.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:875: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā /
GE09ram_03pu:878: sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām // Ram_3,14.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:879: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:880: snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,14.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:881: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_03pu:882: darśayāmāsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,14.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:883: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:884: rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param // Ram_3,14.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:886: atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_3,14.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:887: prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho /
GE09ram_03pu:888: pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ // Ram_3,14.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:890: tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama // Ram_3,14.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:891: evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:892: tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī // Ram_3,14.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:893: kaṃcit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca /
GE09ram_03pu:895: asatas tasya tu sukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:896: śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate // Ram_3,15.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:898: prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyāṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:899: prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:900: pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajan bhrātā saumitrir idam abravīt // Ram_3,15.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:901: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ samprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada /
GE09ram_03pu:902: alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ // Ram_3,15.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:910: vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate // Ram_3,15.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:912: yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ // Ram_3,15.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:916: śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:918: śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:920: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate // Ram_3,15.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:922: sīteva cātapaśyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate // Ram_3,15.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:924: pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ // Ram_3,15.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:930: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,15.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:932: saṃraktaḥ kiṃcid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau // Ram_3,15.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:936: prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ // Ram_3,15.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:938: himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:940: śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam // Ram_3,15.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:942: nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ // Ram_3,15.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:944: tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure // Ram_3,15.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:945: tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn /
GE09ram_03pu:946: tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale // Ram_3,15.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:947: so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:948: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:950: kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate // Ram_3,15.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:952: dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrīniṣedho jitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,15.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:954: saṃtyajya vividhān bhogān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ // Ram_3,15.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:955: jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_03pu:956: vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate // Ram_3,15.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:957: na pitryam anuvartante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti /
GE09ram_03pu:959: bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:960: kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī // Ram_3,15.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:961: ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dhārmike /
GE09ram_03pu:962: parivādaṃ jananyās tam asahan rāghavo 'bravīt // Ram_3,15.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:963: na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:964: tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru // Ram_3,15.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:965: niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā /
GE09ram_03pu:967: ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:968: cakre 'bhiṣekaṃ kākutsthaḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,15.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:969: tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:970: stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ // Ram_3,15.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:971: kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena /
GE09ram_03pu:972: kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā rudraḥ sanandī bhagavān iveśaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:973: kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:974: tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,16.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:976: kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat // Ram_3,16.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:977: sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:979: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_3,16.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:981: taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kācid ājagāma yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,16.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:982: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:983: bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam // Ram_3,16.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:991: taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī // Ram_3,16.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:995: āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam // Ram_3,16.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:996: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:999: tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // Ram_3,16.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1000: bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1001: iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā // Ram_3,16.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1002: niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1003: dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,16.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1004: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā /
GE09ram_03pu:1005: iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,16.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1007: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama // Ram_3,16.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1010: rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1011: pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,16.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1012: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1013: prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau // Ram_3,16.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1014: tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvā pūrvadarśanāt /
GE09ram_03pu:1016: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1017: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava /
GE09ram_03pu:1018: aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām // Ram_3,16.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1020: anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm // Ram_3,16.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1022: paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1023: ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:1024: idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // Ram_3,16.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1026: svacchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt // Ram_3,17.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1028: tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā // Ram_3,17.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1029: anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1030: śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,17.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1032: anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,17.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1033: enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama /
GE09ram_03pu:1034: asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_3,17.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1035: iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā /
GE09ram_03pu:1036: visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1037: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī /
GE09ram_03pu:1038: mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,17.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1039: evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1040: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt // Ram_3,17.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1041: kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:1042: so 'ham āryeṇa paravān bhrātrā kamalavarṇini // Ram_3,17.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1044: āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī // Ram_3,17.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1046: bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati // Ram_3,17.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1047: ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini /
GE09ram_03pu:1048: mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,17.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1050: manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā // Ram_3,17.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1052: sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā // Ram_3,17.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1054: vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase // Ram_3,17.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1056: tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham // Ram_3,17.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1058: abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,17.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1060: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1062: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃcit saumya jīvatīm // Ram_3,17.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1065: ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1066: uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ cicheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,17.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1067: nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1068: yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam // Ram_3,17.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1070: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // Ram_3,17.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1072: pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam // Ram_3,17.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1073: tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃghasaṃvṛtaṃ kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā /
GE09ram_03pu:1074: upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:1075: tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:1076: virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā //
GE09ram_03pu:1077: tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām /
GE09ram_03pu:1078: bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,18.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1080: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā // Ram_3,18.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1082: ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha // Ram_3,18.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1083: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:1086: salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ // Ram_3,18.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1088: saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati // Ram_3,18.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1089: kasya pattrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1090: prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe // Ram_3,18.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1091: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1092: mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave // Ram_3,18.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1093: upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:1094: yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā // Ram_3,18.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1095: iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1096: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt // Ram_3,18.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1100: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe // Ram_3,18.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1102: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā // Ram_3,18.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1103: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ sambhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām /
GE09ram_03pu:1104: imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā // Ram_3,18.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1105: tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham /
GE09ram_03pu:1106: saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,18.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1107: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:1108: tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave // Ram_3,18.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1110: vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān // Ram_3,18.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1112: praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,18.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1113: tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha /
GE09ram_03pu:1114: iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati // Ram_3,18.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1116: śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā // Ram_3,18.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1118: tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // Ram_3,18.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1120: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā // Ram_3,19.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1122: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_3,19.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1123: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm /
GE09ram_03pu:1124: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,19.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1126: imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha // Ram_3,19.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1127: vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1128: tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat // Ram_3,19.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1130: cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt // Ram_3,19.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1132: praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,19.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1136: ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,19.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1138: yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,19.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1139: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:1140: ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnāḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,19.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1143: krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1144: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi // Ram_3,19.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1145: kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani /
GE09ram_03pu:1146: asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave // Ram_3,19.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1148: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam // Ram_3,19.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1149: ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:1151: cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam // Ram_3,19.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1153: tāvadbhir eva cicheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,19.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1156: gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān /
GE09ram_03pu:1157: mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ // Ram_3,19.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1160: te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1162: te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1164: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā /
GE09ram_03pu:1165: paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam // Ram_3,19.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1166: sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1167: upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃcit saṃśuṣkaśoṇitā /
GE09ram_03pu:1168: papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī // Ram_3,19.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1169: nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1170: vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā //
GE09ram_03pu:1171: sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1172: uvāca vyaktayā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām // Ram_3,20.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1173: mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1174: tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ // Ram_3,20.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1175: bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1176: ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama // Ram_3,20.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1177: kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1178: hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau // Ram_3,20.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1179: anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite /
GE09ram_03pu:1180: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha // Ram_3,20.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1181: ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā /
GE09ram_03pu:1182: vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt // Ram_3,20.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1183: preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:1184: nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,20.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1186: samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // Ram_3,20.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1187: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān /
GE09ram_03pu:1188: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama // Ram_3,20.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1189: sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:1190: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī // Ram_3,20.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1192: kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare // Ram_3,20.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1193: ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1194: ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,20.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1195: mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1196: rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:1198: yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:1199: tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā // Ram_3,20.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1200: buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:1201: sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe // Ram_3,20.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1203: mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,20.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1205: niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha // Ram_3,20.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1208: bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā // Ram_3,20.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1209: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:1210: uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,21.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1212: na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam // Ram_3,21.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1213: na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:1214: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati // Ram_3,21.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1215: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa sambhramaś ca vimucyatām /
GE09ram_03pu:1216: ahaṃ rāmaṃ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam // Ram_3,21.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1218: rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi // Ram_3,21.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1219: sā prahṛṣṭā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam /
GE09ram_03pu:1220: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam // Ram_3,21.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1221: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1222: abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā // Ram_3,21.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1228: sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya // Ram_3,21.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1229: upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1230: śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ // Ram_3,21.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1234: sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,21.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1237: matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1238: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam // Ram_3,21.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1240: sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ // Ram_3,21.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1242: tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_3,21.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1244: niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān // Ram_3,21.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1247: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1248: khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,21.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1249: śaktibhiḥ parighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1253: tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān /
GE09ram_03pu:1254: kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃcij jagāma tadanantaram // Ram_3,21.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1256: kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat // Ram_3,21.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1257: sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1258: śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaḥ pratidiśas tathā // Ram_3,21.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1259: pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1260: acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān //
GE09ram_03pu:1261: tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam /
GE09ram_03pu:1264: same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,22.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1268: samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1270: visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1271: vyājahruś ca pradīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:1272: aśivaṃ yātudhānānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_3,22.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1274: ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,22.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1276: diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire // Ram_3,22.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1278: kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ // Ram_3,22.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1282: jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ // Ram_3,22.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1284: utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,22.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1286: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ // Ram_3,22.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1287: uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1288: vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ // Ram_3,22.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1292: prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata // Ram_3,22.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1294: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata // Ram_3,22.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1296: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā // Ram_3,22.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1298: na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva // Ram_3,22.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1299: tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt /
GE09ram_03pu:1300: mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1301: rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:1302: ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe // Ram_3,22.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1303: sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1304: yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ // Ram_3,22.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1305: na kvacit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1306: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1308: vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau // Ram_3,22.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1309: sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1312: ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ // Ram_3,22.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1314: svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ // Ram_3,22.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:1316: cakrahasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān // Ram_3,22.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:1317: etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1318: dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām // Ram_3,22.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:1319: rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1320: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ // Ram_3,22.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:1324: dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam // Ram_3,22.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:1326: catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ // Ram_3,22.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:1328: tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā mālā grahāṇām iva candrasūryau //
GE09ram_03pu:1330: tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha // Ram_3,23.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1332: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,23.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1336: vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ // Ram_3,23.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1337: sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1338: rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,23.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1340: agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca // Ram_3,23.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1341: samprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1342: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ // Ram_3,23.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1343: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam /
GE09ram_03pu:1344: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate // Ram_3,23.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1345: udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1346: niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥparikṣayaḥ // Ram_3,23.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1350: guhām āśraya śailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām // Ram_3,23.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1351: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:1352: śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram // Ram_3,23.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1353: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:1354: śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat // Ram_3,23.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1355: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:1356: hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat // Ram_3,23.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1358: babhūva rāmas timire vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ // Ram_3,23.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1359: sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:1360: babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ // Ram_3,23.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1361: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1362: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam // Ram_3,23.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1364: ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,23.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1368: cāpāni visphārayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ // Ram_3,23.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1370: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayāmāsa tad vanam // Ram_3,23.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1372: dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan // Ram_3,23.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1373: tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata /
GE09ram_03pu:1376: dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam // Ram_3,23.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1377: vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān /
GE09ram_03pu:1378: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,23.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1379: duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan /
GE09ram_03pu:1380: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,23.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1381: tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:1382: dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ // Ram_3,23.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:1384: dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ // Ram_3,24.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1385: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:1386: rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat // Ram_3,24.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1388: yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_3,24.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1389: taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1391: sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1392: babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,24.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1393: tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1394: rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam // Ram_3,24.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1395: mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1396: rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ // Ram_3,24.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1398: abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ // Ram_3,24.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1399: te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1400: śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,24.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1401: sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1402: tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,24.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1403: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1404: pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ // Ram_3,24.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1405: sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe /
GE09ram_03pu:1406: rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ // Ram_3,24.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1408: babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ // Ram_3,24.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1410: ekaṃ sahasrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam // Ram_3,24.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1412: sasarja niśitān bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,24.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1414: mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapattrān ajihmagān // Ram_3,24.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1415: te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā /
GE09ram_03pu:1416: ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva // Ram_3,24.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1417: bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1421: tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1424: bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,24.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1425: tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1426: rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā // Ram_3,24.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1427: kecid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān /
GE09ram_03pu:1429: tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1430: jahāra samare prāṇāṃś cicheda ca śirodharān // Ram_3,24.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1431: avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1433: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1434: abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,24.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1438: rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām // Ram_3,24.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:1439: tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_03pu:1441: pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1442: rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,25.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1444: śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam // Ram_3,25.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1448: āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitam // Ram_3,25.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1453: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau // Ram_3,25.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1456: sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1458: dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:1459: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan // Ram_3,25.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1462: mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,25.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1464: sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham // Ram_3,25.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1465: dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1466: tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha samprāptān atithīn iva // Ram_3,25.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1468: asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam // Ram_3,25.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1470: sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ // Ram_3,25.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1472: jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,25.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1473: te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1474: nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān // Ram_3,25.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1475: rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā /
GE09ram_03pu:1476: sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,25.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1480: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva // Ram_3,25.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1484: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,25.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1485: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1486: rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_3,25.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1487: tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā /
GE09ram_03pu:1488: rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:1490: rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt // Ram_3,26.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1492: paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam // Ram_3,26.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1493: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe /
GE09ram_03pu:1494: yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,26.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1495: ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama /
GE09ram_03pu:1496: vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava // Ram_3,26.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1497: prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:1498: mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi // Ram_3,26.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1500: gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau // Ram_3,26.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1502: abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ // Ram_3,26.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1504: vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ // Ram_3,26.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1506: dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān // Ram_3,26.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1509: tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1510: amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,26.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1512: puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1514: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān /
GE09ram_03pu:1517: nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ // Ram_3,26.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1519: rāmaś cicheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam // Ram_3,26.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1521: bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ // Ram_3,26.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1523: śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ // Ram_3,26.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1525: nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,26.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1527: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva // Ram_3,26.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1528: tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_03pu:1529: rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā // Ram_3,26.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1530: nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:1531: kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam // Ram_3,27.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1532: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:1533: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api // Ram_3,27.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1534: tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1535: āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1537: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // Ram_3,27.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1539: cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,27.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1540: sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1541: pūrayāmāsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1543: nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,27.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1546: śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate /
GE09ram_03pu:1549: ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam // Ram_3,27.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1553: dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1555: āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakam // Ram_3,27.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1557: kharaś cicheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam // Ram_3,27.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1558: sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi /
GE09ram_03pu:1560: tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1562: sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1563: rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan // Ram_3,27.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1565: cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1566: sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:1567: varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata // Ram_3,27.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1569: cicheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam // Ram_3,27.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1570: sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1571: jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā // Ram_3,27.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1572: taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1573: vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,27.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1575: viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam // Ram_3,27.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1576: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave /
GE09ram_03pu:1577: mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān // Ram_3,27.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1578: śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat /
GE09ram_03pu:1579: tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha // Ram_3,27.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1581: jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān // Ram_3,27.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1582: tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān /
GE09ram_03pu:1583: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye cicheda kharasāratheḥ // Ram_3,27.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:1584: tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1585: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.28*1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1589: gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā // Ram_3,27.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:1590: tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1591: apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ // Ram_3,27.30
GE09ram_03pu:1592: kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:1593: mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,28.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1597: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati // Ram_3,28.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1599: tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam // Ram_3,28.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1600: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate /
GE09ram_03pu:1601: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva // Ram_3,28.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1603: kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa // Ram_3,28.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1605: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ // Ram_3,28.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1606: avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1607: ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam // Ram_3,28.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1608: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam /
GE09ram_03pu:1611: aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara // Ram_3,28.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1612: adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1613: vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ // Ram_3,28.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1615: tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi // Ram_3,28.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1616: adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1617: nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā // Ram_3,28.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1618: prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:1619: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1620: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1621: pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ // Ram_3,28.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1623: ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi // Ram_3,28.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1624: vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1625: kathayanti na te kiṃcit tejasā svena garvitāḥ // Ram_3,28.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1627: nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase // Ram_3,28.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1629: mṛtyukāle hi samprāpte svayam aprastave stavam // Ram_3,28.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1630: sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam /
GE09ram_03pu:1632: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam /
GE09ram_03pu:1633: dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam // Ram_3,28.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1634: paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava /
GE09ram_03pu:1635: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,28.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1636: kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham /
