GE09ram_03pu:1637: astaṃ gaccheddhi savitā yuddhavighnas tato bhavet // Ram_3,28.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1639: tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam // Ram_3,28.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1640: ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1641: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1643: bhasma vṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ // Ram_3,28.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1645: antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś cicheda bahudhā śaraiḥ // Ram_3,28.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:1646: sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_03pu:1648: bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1649: smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,29.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1651: śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam avagarjasi // Ram_3,29.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1655: rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ // Ram_3,29.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1657: prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_3,29.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1659: vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,29.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1661: svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva // Ram_3,29.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1663: bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime // Ram_3,29.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1665: nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane // Ram_3,29.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1669: anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ // Ram_3,29.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1671: tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ // Ram_3,29.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1672: tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:1674: dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1675: vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase // Ram_3,29.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1677: kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ // Ram_3,29.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1678: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhrukuṭiṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1679: sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,29.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1681: sa tam utpāṭayāmāsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam // Ram_3,29.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1683: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt // Ram_3,29.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1684: tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:1685: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1687: nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1688: tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam /
GE09ram_03pu:1690: vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:1691: matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam // Ram_3,29.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1695: kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam // Ram_3,29.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1696: sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_03pu:1697: saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati // Ram_3,29.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:1699: rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat // Ram_3,29.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1700: sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā /
GE09ram_03pu:1702: sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:1703: balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,29.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:1705: sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,29.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:1708: ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1709: eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // Ram_3,29.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:1710: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja /
GE09ram_03pu:1711: sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ // Ram_3,29.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:1712: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:1714: tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1717: babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje // Ram_3,29.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:1719: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām // Ram_3,30.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1720: dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:1721: dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā // Ram_3,30.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1722: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram /
GE09ram_03pu:1725: upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam // Ram_3,30.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1727: rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam // Ram_3,30.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1729: ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam // Ram_3,30.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1737: āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā // Ram_3,30.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1739: kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam // Ram_3,30.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1742: purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim /
GE09ram_03pu:1743: takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1745: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1746: vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:1747: vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān // Ram_3,30.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1751: purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1753: abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte // Ram_3,30.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1755: havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,30.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1759: rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:1763: sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā // Ram_3,30.22
GE09ram_03pu:1765: amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,31.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1767: samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1769: lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ // Ram_3,31.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1770: svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1771: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati // Ram_3,31.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1773: varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ // Ram_3,31.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1774: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1775: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā // Ram_3,31.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1777: ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,31.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1778: yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:1779: asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ // Ram_3,31.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1780: yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1781: cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ // Ram_3,31.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1782: ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:1783: svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1785: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,31.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1786: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1788: tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:1789: viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1793: krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano 'pi narādhipam // Ram_3,31.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1794: nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1795: kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,31.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1796: śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1797: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ // Ram_3,31.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1798: upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:1799: evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho 'pi nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,31.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1800: apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1801: kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // Ram_3,31.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1803: vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ // Ram_3,31.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1804: tvaṃ tu rāvaṇa durbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1805: yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_3,31.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1807: ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate //
GE09ram_03pu:1808: iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1809: dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito vicintayāmāsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:1810: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1812: kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃvīryaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1813: kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram // Ram_3,32.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1814: āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1815: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā // Ram_3,32.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1817: tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,32.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1821: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān // Ram_3,32.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1822: nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:1823: na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge // Ram_3,32.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1824: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1825: indreṇevottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,32.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1827: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā // Ram_3,32.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1829: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ // Ram_3,32.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1833: anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,32.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:1834: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī /
GE09ram_03pu:1835: rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ // Ram_3,32.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1837: sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,32.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1838: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī /
GE09ram_03pu:1839: tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale // Ram_3,32.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1840: yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet /
GE09ram_03pu:1841: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt // Ram_3,32.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1843: tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ // Ram_3,32.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1845: bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām // Ram_3,32.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1847: manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,32.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1848: yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate /
GE09ram_03pu:1849: śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,32.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:1850: kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:1852: taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham /
GE09ram_03pu:1853: hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase // Ram_3,32.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1854: rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:1855: kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava // Ram_3,32.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1856: niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān /
GE09ram_03pu:1857: kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi // Ram_3,32.24
GE09ram_03pu:1859: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1860: tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1861: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam // Ram_3,33.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1862: iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1863: sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1865: sūtaṃ saṃcodayāmāsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti // Ram_3,33.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1883: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,33.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1885: nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,33.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1886: jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāraṇaiś copaśobhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:1887: ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ // Ram_3,33.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1891: devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ // Ram_3,33.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1899: vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca // Ram_3,33.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1900: agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1901: takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām // Ram_3,33.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:1902: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:1903: muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ // Ram_3,33.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:1905: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,33.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:1909: taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam // Ram_3,33.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:1911: tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam // Ram_3,33.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:1912: samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1913: yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kacchapam /
GE09ram_03pu:1914: bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,33.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:1915: tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1918: ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,33.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:1919: teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām /
GE09ram_03pu:1920: jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau // Ram_3,33.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:1923: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn // Ram_3,33.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:1925: amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim // Ram_3,33.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:1929: nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // Ram_3,33.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:1930: taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1931: dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare // Ram_3,33.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:1933: dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasam // Ram_3,33.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:1934: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā /
GE09ram_03pu:1935: tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_3,33.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:1936: mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1937: ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,34.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:1938: jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama /
GE09ram_03pu:1939: dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me // Ram_3,34.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1941: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,34.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:1943: bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,34.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1946: te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1947: saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge // Ram_3,34.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1949: anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃcic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,34.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1951: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,34.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1952: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1953: hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ // Ram_3,34.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1955: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,34.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:1957: tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ // Ram_3,34.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:1958: yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam /
GE09ram_03pu:1961: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava // Ram_3,34.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:1962: tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala /
GE09ram_03pu:1963: bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye // Ram_3,34.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:1964: tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:1965: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava // Ram_3,34.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:1967: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama // Ram_3,34.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:1968: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:1969: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara // Ram_3,34.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:1970: tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:1971: gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati // Ram_3,34.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:1972: tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:1973: nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva // Ram_3,34.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:1977: śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca // Ram_3,34.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:1979: kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca //
GE09ram_03pu:1983: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // Ram_3,35.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:1984: na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam /
GE09ram_03pu:1986: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām /
GE09ram_03pu:1987: api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasam // Ram_3,35.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:1989: api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,35.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:1990: api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam /
GE09ram_03pu:1991: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā // Ram_3,35.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:1993: ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ // Ram_3,35.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:1994: na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:1995: na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,35.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:1997: na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ // Ram_3,35.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:1999: kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam // Ram_3,35.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2001: hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,35.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2002: na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2003: anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_3,35.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2005: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,35.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2006: kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā /
GE09ram_03pu:2007: icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,35.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2009: rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,35.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2012: rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2014: aprameyaṃ hi tattejo yasya sā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:2015: na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane // Ram_3,35.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2017: dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā // Ram_3,35.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2018: kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa /
GE09ram_03pu:2019: dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tadantaṃ tava jīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2020: jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham // Ram_3,35.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2022: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,35.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2023: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:2024: ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2025: hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,35.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2026: ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā /
GE09ram_03pu:2027: idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa //
GE09ram_03pu:2028: kadācid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām /
GE09ram_03pu:2034: svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt // Ram_3,36.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2035: ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2036: mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara // Ram_3,36.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2037: ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:2040: kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:2041: vadhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam // Ram_3,36.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2042: ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:2043: rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,36.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2044: bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe /
GE09ram_03pu:2045: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,36.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2046: ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam /
GE09ram_03pu:2047: jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,36.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2048: taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2049: babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ // Ram_3,36.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2053: adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,36.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2055: balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam // Ram_3,36.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2057: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asambhrāntaś cakāra ha // Ram_3,36.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2058: avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:2059: viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_3,36.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2060: tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2061: tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane // Ram_3,36.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2064: prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm // Ram_3,36.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2065: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2067: tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham /
GE09ram_03pu:2068: kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi // Ram_3,36.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2070: rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi // Ram_3,36.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2072: drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte // Ram_3,36.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2074: parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā // Ram_3,36.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2076: drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān // Ram_3,36.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2077: hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśa vidravato diśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2078: hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān // Ram_3,36.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2080: pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam // Ram_3,36.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2082: bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣa rākṣasa // Ram_3,36.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2083: mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2084: yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāmavipriyam // Ram_3,36.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2085: nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2087: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃcit tena saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:2088: idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram // Ram_3,37.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2089: rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2094: atyantaghoro vyacaraṃ tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan // Ram_3,37.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2096: rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan // Ram_3,37.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2100: āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam // Ram_3,37.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2101: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham /
GE09ram_03pu:2104: tāpaso 'yam iti jñātvā pūrvavairam anusmaran // Ram_3,37.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2106: jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran // Ram_3,37.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2107: tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2110: ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,37.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2112: samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau // Ram_3,37.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2113: śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃcit prāpya jīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2114: iha pravrājito yuktas tāpaso 'haṃ samāhitaḥ // Ram_3,37.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2118: rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me // Ram_3,37.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2119: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:2120: dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ // Ram_3,37.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2122: ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_3,37.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2123: ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam /
GE09ram_03pu:2124: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:2125: na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi // Ram_3,37.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2126: idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase /
GE09ram_03pu:2127: sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:2128: mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2129: ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham // Ram_3,38.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2131: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ // Ram_3,38.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2132: yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate /
GE09ram_03pu:2133: vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare // Ram_3,38.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2134: tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:2136: yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:2137: strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ // Ram_3,38.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2138: avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2139: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau // Ram_3,38.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2140: evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate /
GE09ram_03pu:2141: na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,38.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2142: doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2143: apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścaye // Ram_3,38.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2145: udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,38.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2146: vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2147: upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_3,38.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2148: sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate /
GE09ram_03pu:2149: nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam // Ram_3,38.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2151: agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:2152: auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām // Ram_3,38.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2153: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2154: tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,38.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2156: guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:2157: asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,38.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2158: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2159: pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_3,38.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2160: tvāṃ tu māyāmṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā /
GE09ram_03pu:2161: ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī // Ram_3,38.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2162: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:2163: ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva // Ram_3,38.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2164: evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:2165: rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata // Ram_3,38.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2166: gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye /
GE09ram_03pu:2167: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:2168: laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā // Ram_3,38.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2169: etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2170: rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate // Ram_3,38.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2171: āsādya taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya /
GE09ram_03pu:2172: etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam //
GE09ram_03pu:2174: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,39.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2177: kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt /
GE09ram_03pu:2178: kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ // Ram_3,39.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2180: icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā // Ram_3,39.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2182: yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara // Ram_3,39.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2183: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2184: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,39.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2185: amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2186: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // Ram_3,39.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2187: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:2189: viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2191: rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:2192: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ // Ram_3,39.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2193: rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:2194: na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa // Ram_3,39.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2195: ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai /
GE09ram_03pu:2196: viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā // Ram_3,39.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2200: rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā // Ram_3,39.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2202: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,39.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2203: tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:2204: atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,39.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2205: māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:2206: anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ // Ram_3,39.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2207: darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya /
GE09ram_03pu:2208: ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam // Ram_3,39.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2209: ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:2210: naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,39.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2211: nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:2212: paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam //
GE09ram_03pu:2213: evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2214: gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ // Ram_3,40.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2216: madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // Ram_3,40.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2217: kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani /
GE09ram_03pu:2218: eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācara // Ram_3,40.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2219: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2220: pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,40.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2221: etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2222: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,40.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2224: mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ // Ram_3,40.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2225: tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham /
GE09ram_03pu:2226: āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt // Ram_3,40.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2227: tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:2228: girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_3,40.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2232: haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,40.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2234: kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ // Ram_3,40.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2235: sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:2236: mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2244: kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ // Ram_3,40.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2245: vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_03pu:2246: manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,40.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2248: vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ // Ram_3,40.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2250: viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2255: punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2256: gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate // Ram_3,40.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2257: vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati /
GE09ram_03pu:2260: sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,40.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2262: samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ // Ram_3,40.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2264: rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ // Ram_3,40.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2266: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā // Ram_3,40.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2268: karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūtāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā // Ram_3,40.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2274: sa ca tāṃ rāmadayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2275: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,40.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2277: vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā // Ram_3,40.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2278: sā taṃ samprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī /
GE09ram_03pu:2281: bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham // Ram_3,41.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2283: vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam // Ram_3,41.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2284: śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:2285: tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam // Ram_3,41.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2287: anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,41.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2288: asya māyāvido māyā- mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:2290: mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratna- vicitro nāsti rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:2291: jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,41.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2293: uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā // Ram_3,41.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2295: ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2297: mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā // Ram_3,41.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2298: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kiṃnarās tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:2300: na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā /
GE09ram_03pu:2301: tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ // Ram_3,41.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2303: dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ // Ram_3,41.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2304: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasampac ca śobhanā /
GE09ram_03pu:2305: mṛgo 'dbhuto vicitro 'sau hṛdayaṃ haratīva me // Ram_3,41.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2306: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava /
GE09ram_03pu:2311: mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati // Ram_3,41.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2312: jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2313: ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2315: śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum // Ram_3,41.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2316: kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam /
GE09ram_03pu:2317: vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama // Ram_3,41.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2320: babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam // Ram_3,41.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2321: evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam /
GE09ram_03pu:2322: uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,41.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2323: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām /
GE09ram_03pu:2324: rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2326: kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaścit samo mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2328: śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ // Ram_3,41.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2330: jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām // Ram_3,41.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2332: kasya nāmābhirūpo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2334: nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet // Ram_3,41.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2335: māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2336: ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,41.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:2339: tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam /
GE09ram_03pu:2340: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2342: tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2344: upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā // Ram_3,41.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2345: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī /
GE09ram_03pu:2346: bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ // Ram_3,41.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:2347: eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2348: ubhāv etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛgamahīmṛgau // Ram_3,41.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:2349: yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2350: māyaiṣā rākṣasasyeti kartavyo 'sya vadho mayā // Ram_3,41.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:2352: vane vicaratā pūrvaṃ hiṃsitā munipuṃgavāḥ // Ram_3,41.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:2354: nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:2356: udarastho dvijān hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīm iva // Ram_3,41.39 //
GE09ram_03pu:2357: sa kadācic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim /
GE09ram_03pu:2358: agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha // Ram_3,41.40 //
GE09ram_03pu:2359: samutthāne ca tadrūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam /
GE09ram_03pu:2360: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt // Ram_3,41.41 //
GE09ram_03pu:2362: jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,41.42 //
GE09ram_03pu:2363: evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2366: iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm // Ram_3,41.44 //
GE09ram_03pu:2367: asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana /
GE09ram_03pu:2368: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy athavā mṛgam // Ram_3,41.45 //
GE09ram_03pu:2369: yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam /
GE09ram_03pu:2370: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīṃ mṛgatvaci gataspṛhām // Ram_3,41.46 //
GE09ram_03pu:2371: tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:2372: apramattena te bhāvyam āśramasthena sītayā // Ram_3,41.47 //
GE09ram_03pu:2373: yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham /
GE09ram_03pu:2374: hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.48 //
GE09ram_03pu:2375: pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2376: bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva śaṅkitaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:2377: tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2380: ābadhya ca kalāpau dvau jagāmodagravikramaḥ // Ram_3,42.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2381: taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai /
GE09ram_03pu:2383: baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2384: taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ // Ram_3,42.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2386: ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadācana // Ram_3,42.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2388: daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣucit // Ram_3,42.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2390: muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate // Ram_3,42.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2392: āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ // Ram_3,42.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2394: mṛgaiḥ parivṛto vanyair adūrāt pratyadṛśyata // Ram_3,42.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2395: dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2396: saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī // Ram_3,42.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2397: tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam /
GE09ram_03pu:2403: mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum // Ram_3,42.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2404: samprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram /
GE09ram_03pu:2405: sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // Ram_3,42.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2407: mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2408: cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan // Ram_3,42.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2411: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam /
GE09ram_03pu:2412: jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran // Ram_3,42.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2413: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:2414: mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet // Ram_3,42.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2415: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:2416: iti saṃcintya dharmātmā rāmo hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ // Ram_3,42.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2417: tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam /
GE09ram_03pu:2418: rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tatsvaram // Ram_3,42.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2419: nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2421: ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:2422: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam // Ram_3,43.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2423: na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate /
GE09ram_03pu:2424: krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam // Ram_3,43.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2425: ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2426: taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam // Ram_3,43.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2427: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam /
GE09ram_03pu:2428: na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_3,43.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2429: tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:2430: saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat // Ram_3,43.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2431: yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase /
GE09ram_03pu:2432: icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte // Ram_3,43.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2433: vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te /
GE09ram_03pu:2434: tena tiṣṭhasi viśrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim // Ram_3,43.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2435: kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:2436: kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2438: abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva // Ram_3,43.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2440: rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kiṃnareṣu mṛgeṣu ca // Ram_3,43.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2441: dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:2442: yo rāmaṃ pratiyudhyeta samare vāsavopamam // Ram_3,43.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2443: avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2444: na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_3,43.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2445: anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api /
GE09ram_03pu:2446: tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api // Ram_3,43.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2447: hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam /
GE09ram_03pu:2448: āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam // Ram_3,43.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2449: na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaścid api daivataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2450: gandharvanagaraprakhyā māyā sā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,43.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2452: rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe // Ram_3,43.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2453: kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2454: kharasya nidhane devi janasthānavadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,43.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2456: hiṃsāvihārā vaidehi na cintayitum arhasi // Ram_3,43.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2458: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavādinam // Ram_3,43.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2460: ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase // Ram_3,43.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2461: naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:2463: suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2464: mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā // Ram_3,43.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2466: upasaṃśritya bhartāraṃ kāmayeyaṃ pṛthag janam // Ram_3,43.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2467: samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2468: rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale // Ram_3,43.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2469: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā romaharṣaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:2470: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ sītāṃ prāñjalir vijitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,43.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2471: uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama /
GE09ram_03pu:2472: vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili // Ram_3,43.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2473: svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate /
GE09ram_03pu:2474: vimuktadharmāś capalās tīkṣṇā bhedakarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_3,43.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2476: nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā // Ram_3,43.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2477: dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase /
GE09ram_03pu:2479: gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:2480: rakṣantu tvāṃ viśālākṣi samagrā vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,43.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:2481: nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me /
GE09ram_03pu:2482: api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2484: pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ tīvraṃ bāṣpapariplutā // Ram_3,43.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2486: ābandhiṣye 'thavā tyakṣye viṣame deham ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,43.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2487: pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam /
GE09ram_03pu:2488: na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe // Ram_3,43.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:2490: pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha // Ram_3,43.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:2491: tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām /
GE09ram_03pu:2492: āśvāsayāmāsa na caiva bhartus taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃcid uvāca sītā //
GE09ram_03pu:2493: tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃcid abhipraṇamya /
GE09ram_03pu:2494: avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān //
GE09ram_03pu:2495: tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2496: sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva // Ram_3,44.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2503: rahitāṃ sūryacandrābhyāṃ saṃdhyām iva mahattamaḥ // Ram_3,44.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2504: tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:2505: rohiṇīṃ śaśinā hīnāṃ grahavad bhṛśadāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2507: samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ // Ram_3,44.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2508: śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam /
GE09ram_03pu:2509: stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,44.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2510: rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare /
GE09ram_03pu:2511: upatasthe ca vaidehīṃ bhikṣurūpeṇa rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2513: abhyavartata vaidehīṃ citrām iva śanaiścaraḥ // Ram_3,44.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2514: sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2515: atiṣṭhat prekṣya vaidehīṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,44.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2521: abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,44.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2522: tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:2523: vibhrājamānāṃ vapuṣā rāvaṇaḥ praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_3,44.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2525: kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī // Ram_3,44.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2526: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane /
GE09ram_03pu:2527: bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī // Ram_3,44.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2528: samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava /
GE09ram_03pu:2529: viśāle vimale netre raktānte kṛṣṇatārake // Ram_3,44.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2531: etāv upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau // Ram_3,44.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2535: mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā // Ram_3,44.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2537: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī // Ram_3,44.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2539: iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmādayanti me // Ram_3,44.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2540: sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2541: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // Ram_3,44.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2543: sampannāni sugandhīni yuktāny ācarituṃ tvayā // Ram_3,44.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2544: varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:2545: bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe // Ram_3,44.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2546: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite /
GE09ram_03pu:2547: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me // Ram_3,44.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2548: neha gacchanti gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2549: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā // Ram_3,44.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2551: ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyasi // Ram_3,44.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2553: katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi varānane // Ram_3,44.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:2554: kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_03pu:2555: ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasasevitān // Ram_3,44.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:2557: dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:2560: abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam // Ram_3,44.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2561: dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:2562: aśakyam udveṣṭum upāyadarśanān nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam //
GE09ram_03pu:2563: iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:2564: idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām //
GE09ram_03pu:2566: prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ samarpayāmāsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:2567: tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayāgataṃ patiṃ pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:2568: nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau //
GE09ram_03pu:2569: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:2571: brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām /
GE09ram_03pu:2572: iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,45.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2574: sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama // Ram_3,45.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2577: tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim /
GE09ram_03pu:2580: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam // Ram_3,45.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2581: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me /
GE09ram_03pu:2583: dvāv ayācata bhartāraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ nṛpottamam // Ram_3,45.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2584: nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadācana /
GE09ram_03pu:2585: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate // Ram_3,45.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2586: iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2587: ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā // Ram_3,45.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2589: rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2591: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:2592: kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,45.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2593: tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:2594: bharatāya pradātavyam idaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_3,45.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2595: tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_03pu:2596: vane pravraja kākutstha pitaraṃ mocayānṛtāt // Ram_3,45.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2597: tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2598: cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_3,45.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2599: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyaṃ brūyān na cānṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:2600: etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam // Ram_3,45.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2601: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:2603: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2604: anvagacchad dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantaṃ mayā saha // Ram_3,45.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2605: te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaikeyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2606: vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanaṃ gambhīram ojasā // Ram_3,45.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2607: samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:2608: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam // Ram_3,45.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2609: sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2610: ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija // Ram_3,45.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2614: ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,45.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2616: ratiṃ svakeṣu dāreṣu nādhigacchāmy anindite // Ram_3,45.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2618: sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava // Ram_3,45.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2619: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī /
GE09ram_03pu:2621: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2624: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi // Ram_3,45.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2628: mahodadhim ivākṣobhyam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:2630: nṛsiṃhaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:2632: pṛthukīrtiṃ mahābāhum ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2633: tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām /
GE09ram_03pu:2634: nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā // Ram_3,45.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2635: pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk /
GE09ram_03pu:2636: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,45.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2638: āśīviṣasya vadanād daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi // Ram_3,45.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:2640: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi // Ram_3,45.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:2641: akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā lekṣi ca kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:2642: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:2643: avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2645: yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi // Ram_3,45.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:2647: kalyāṇavṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi // Ram_3,45.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:2649: rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.39 //
GE09ram_03pu:2650: yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2651: surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:2652: yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2653: yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:2654: yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api /
GE09ram_03pu:2655: yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:2657: hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam //
GE09ram_03pu:2658: itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam /
GE09ram_03pu:2659: gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī //
GE09ram_03pu:2660: tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2661: kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham //
GE09ram_03pu:2663: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha // Ram_3,46.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2665: rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān // Ram_3,46.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2667: vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ // Ram_3,46.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2669: dvaṃdvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ // Ram_3,46.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2672: yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_03pu:2673: vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasam // Ram_3,46.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2676: yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2677: tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt sampadyate raviḥ // Ram_3,46.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2679: bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca // Ram_3,46.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2680: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā /
GE09ram_03pu:2686: tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:2687: na smariṣyasi nārīṇāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ manasvini // Ram_3,46.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2688: bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini /
GE09ram_03pu:2689: na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2690: sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2691: mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam // Ram_3,46.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2695: na manmathaśarāviṣṭaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,46.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2696: pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru- paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2698: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā /
GE09ram_03pu:2699: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,46.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2701: bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi // Ram_3,46.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2703: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,46.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2704: apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum /
GE09ram_03pu:2705: na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam // Ram_3,46.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2706: jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām /
GE09ram_03pu:2707: na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasa dharṣayitvā pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.23
GE09ram_03pu:2709: haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ // Ram_3,47.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2710: sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam /
GE09ram_03pu:2711: nonmattayā śrutau manye mama vīryaparākramau // Ram_3,47.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2712: udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2713: āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ // Ram_3,47.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2714: arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam /
GE09ram_03pu:2715: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim // Ram_3,47.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2717: kruddhasya hariparyante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_3,47.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2718: sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2719: svaṃ rūpaṃ kālarūpābhaṃ bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ // Ram_3,47.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:2721: daśāsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadācaraḥ // Ram_3,47.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2723: pratipede svakaṃ rūpaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,47.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2725: raktāmbaradharas tasthau strīratnaṃ prekṣya maithilīm // Ram_3,47.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2726: sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva /
GE09ram_03pu:2728: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:2729: mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ // Ram_3,47.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2730: māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2731: naiva cāhaṃ kvacid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:2732: tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām // Ram_3,47.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2734: kair guṇair anuraktāsi mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini // Ram_3,47.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2735: yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam /
GE09ram_03pu:2736: asmin vyālānucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ // Ram_3,47.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2737: ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:2738: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,47.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2739: vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2740: ūrvos tu dakṣiṇenaiva parijagrāha pāṇinā // Ram_3,47.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2743: sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2745: tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2746: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ ratham āropayat tadā // Ram_3,47.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2748: rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane // Ram_3,47.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2749: tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva /
GE09ram_03pu:2752: bhṛśaṃ cukrośa matteva bhrāntacittā yathāturā // Ram_3,47.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2754: hriyamāṇāṃ na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,47.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2755: jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan /
GE09ram_03pu:2756: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi // Ram_3,47.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2758: katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam // Ram_3,47.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2760: kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye // Ram_3,47.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2762: jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rāmād vyasanam āpnuhi // Ram_3,47.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2763: hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_03pu:2766: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:2768: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:2770: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2771: daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape /
GE09ram_03pu:2772: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām // Ram_3,47.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2773: yāni kānicid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta /
GE09ram_03pu:2774: sarvāṇi śaraṇaṃ yāmi mṛgapakṣigaṇān api // Ram_3,47.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2779: rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama /
GE09ram_03pu:2780: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,47.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:2781: taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve /
GE09ram_03pu:2782: niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // Ram_3,48.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2784: vanaspatigataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhāṃ giram // Ram_3,48.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:2786: jaṭāyur nāma nāmnāhaṃ gṛdhrarājo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,48.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2788: lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,48.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2790: sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi // Ram_3,48.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2791: kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet /
GE09ram_03pu:2794: na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet /
GE09ram_03pu:2795: yathātmanas tathānyeṣāṃ dārā rakṣyā vimarśanāt // Ram_3,48.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2796: arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣvanāgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:2797: vyavasyanty anu rājānaṃ dharmaṃ paulastyanandana // Ram_3,48.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:2798: rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2799: dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,48.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2800: pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:2801: aiśvaryam abhisamprāpto vimānam iva duṣkṛtiḥ // Ram_3,48.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2802: kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum /
GE09ram_03pu:2803: na hi duṣṭātmanām āryam āvasaty ālaye ciram // Ram_3,48.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:2804: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2808: atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2809: yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2810: kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:2811: dahed dahanabhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā // Ram_3,48.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2813: grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi // Ram_3,48.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2814: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet /
GE09ram_03pu:2815: tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam // Ram_3,48.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2816: yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi /
GE09ram_03pu:2817: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret // Ram_3,48.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2820: vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī /
GE09ram_03pu:2821: tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2822: na śaktas tvaṃ balāddhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2823: hetubhir nyāyasaṃyuktair dhruvāṃ vedaśrutim iva // Ram_3,48.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2824: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2825: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā // Ram_3,48.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2827: nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati // Ram_3,48.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2828: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau /
GE09ram_03pu:2829: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,48.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:2830: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām /
GE09ram_03pu:2831: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām // Ram_3,48.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2832: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2833: jīvitenāpi rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,48.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:2834: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2836: vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt // Ram_3,48.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2841: sa samprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane /
GE09ram_03pu:2842: babhūva vātoddhatayor meghayor gagane yathā // Ram_3,49.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:2850: cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ // Ram_3,49.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2853: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2854: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // Ram_3,49.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2856: acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat // Ram_3,49.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2860: pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,49.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:2862: tāṃś cāsya javasampannāñ jaghāna samare balī // Ram_3,49.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2865: pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chattraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha // Ram_3,49.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2867: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:2869: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan // Ram_3,49.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2870: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam /
GE09ram_03pu:2871: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2873: gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,49.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2875: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām // Ram_3,49.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:2877: viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam // Ram_3,49.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2879: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,49.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2880: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase /
GE09ram_03pu:2881: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā // Ram_3,49.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:2882: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2883: dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau // Ram_3,49.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2884: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:2886: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:2887: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā // Ram_3,49.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:2890: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān /
GE09ram_03pu:2891: kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api // Ram_3,49.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:2892: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2893: nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān // Ram_3,49.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2894: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2895: adhirūḍho gajāroho yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam // Ram_3,49.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:2896: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan /
GE09ram_03pu:2898: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2899: amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,49.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2903: vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,49.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2904: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:2905: muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat // Ram_3,49.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:2907: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca // Ram_3,49.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:2909: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya socchinat // Ram_3,49.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:2911: nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,49.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:2912: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam /
GE09ram_03pu:2913: abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā // Ram_3,49.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:2915: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam //
GE09ram_03pu:2916: tatas tu taṃ pattrarathaṃ mahītale nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam /
GE09ram_03pu:2917: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā //
GE09ram_03pu:2919: dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt // Ram_3,50.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:2920: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam /
GE09ram_03pu:2924: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2925: dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:2926: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā /
GE09ram_03pu:2927: susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike // Ram_3,50.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:2930: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān /
GE09ram_03pu:2931: muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:2932: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:2935: jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam // Ram_3,50.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:2936: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:2937: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // Ram_3,50.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:2938: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2940: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:2943: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā // Ram_3,50.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:2944: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2945: adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpta ivāgninā // Ram_3,50.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:2949: babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape // Ram_3,50.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:2950: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam /
GE09ram_03pu:2951: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam // Ram_3,50.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:2952: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2954: śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam // Ram_3,50.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:2958: śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,50.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:2960: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā // Ram_3,50.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:2964: babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ // Ram_3,50.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:2974: prāśobhayata vaidehī gajaṃ kaṣyeva kāñcanī // Ram_3,50.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:2978: saghoṣāṇy avakīryanta kṣīṇās tārā ivāmbarāt // Ram_3,50.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:2980: vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā // Ram_3,50.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:2982: mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ // Ram_3,50.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:2984: sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm // Ram_3,50.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:2989: hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:2991: nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā /
GE09ram_03pu:2992: yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.37 //
GE09ram_03pu:2997: vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām /
GE09ram_03pu:2998: tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām // Ram_3,50.40 //
GE09ram_03pu:3002: tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī /
GE09ram_03pu:3004: kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:3005: duḥkhitā paramodvignā bhaye mahati vartinī // Ram_3,51.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3007: rudatī karuṇaṃ sītā hriyamāṇedam abravīt // Ram_3,51.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3009: jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase // Ram_3,51.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3010: tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā /
GE09ram_03pu:3012: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ // Ram_3,51.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3013: paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:3014: viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā // Ram_3,51.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3015: īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase /
GE09ram_03pu:3016: striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca // Ram_3,51.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3019: dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:3020: kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam // Ram_3,51.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3021: kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3022: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // Ram_3,51.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3023: na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3024: sasainyo 'pi samarthas tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_3,51.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3025: na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:3026: vane prajvalitasyeva sparśam agner vihaṃgamaḥ // Ram_3,51.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3027: sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3028: matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama /
GE09ram_03pu:3029: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi // Ram_3,51.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3030: yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3031: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,51.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3032: na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam /
GE09ram_03pu:3033: utsahe śatruvaśagā prāṇān dhārayituṃ ciram // Ram_3,51.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3034: na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase /
GE09ram_03pu:3035: mṛtyukāle yathā martyo viparītāni sevate // Ram_3,51.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3036: mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate /
GE09ram_03pu:3037: paśyāmīva hi kaṇṭhe tvāṃ kālapāśāvapāśitam // Ram_3,51.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3038: yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣi daśānana /
GE09ram_03pu:3039: vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān // Ram_3,51.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3041: khaḍgapattravanaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ paśyasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,51.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3043: drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām // Ram_3,51.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3044: na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3045: dharituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,51.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3047: kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ // Ram_3,51.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3049: rākṣasā nihatā yena sahasrāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_3,51.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3050: sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī /
GE09ram_03pu:3051: na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam // Ram_3,51.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3052: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā /
GE09ram_03pu:3054: tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3055: jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum //
GE09ram_03pu:3056: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃcin nātham apaśyatī /
GE09ram_03pu:3060: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī // Ram_3,52.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3062: sambhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhavān // Ram_3,52.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3063: piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva /
GE09ram_03pu:3064: vikrośantīṃ tadā sītāṃ dadṛśur vānararṣabhāḥ // Ram_3,52.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3065: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3066: jagāma rudatīṃ gṛhya maithilīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ // Ram_3,52.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3067: tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3069: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā /
GE09ram_03pu:3070: sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ // Ram_3,52.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3072: saritāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā samatīyāya sāgaram // Ram_3,52.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3076: etadanto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan // Ram_3,52.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3077: sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3078: praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,52.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3082: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm // Ram_3,52.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3084: yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ // Ram_3,52.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3086: yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā // Ram_3,52.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3087: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃcid apriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:3088: ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam // Ram_3,52.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3089: tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:3090: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan /
GE09ram_03pu:3092: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3093: uvācaitān idaṃ vākyaṃ praśasya balavīryataḥ // Ram_3,52.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3097: pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ // Ram_3,52.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3098: balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3099: sadūṣaṇakharaṃ yuddhe hataṃ tad rāmasāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,52.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3101: vairaṃ ca sumahajjātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam // Ram_3,52.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3102: niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3103: na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum // Ram_3,52.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3104: taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam /
GE09ram_03pu:3105: rāmaṃ śarmopalapsyāmi dhanaṃ labdhveva nirdhanaḥ // Ram_3,52.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3106: janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā /
GE09ram_03pu:3107: pravṛttir upanetavyā kiṃ karotīti tattvataḥ // Ram_3,52.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3108: apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3109: kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,52.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3111: ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ // Ram_3,52.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3112: tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya rāvaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:3113: vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:3114: tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ susamprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3115: prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:3119: praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran // Ram_3,53.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3120: sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3123: vāyuvegair ivākrāntāṃ majjantīṃ nāvam arṇave // Ram_3,53.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3125: adhomukhamukhīṃ dīnām abhyetya ca niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,53.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3126: tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3127: sa balād darśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam // Ram_3,53.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3130: kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:3133: sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha // Ram_3,53.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3140: darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam /
GE09ram_03pu:3141: uvāca vākyaṃ pāpātmā rāvaṇo janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3143: varjayitvā jarāvṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān // Ram_3,53.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3144: teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:3145: sahasram ekam ekasya mama kāryapuraḥsaram // Ram_3,53.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3146: yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3147: jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī // Ram_3,53.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3149: tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye // Ram_3,53.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3150: sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama /
GE09ram_03pu:3151: bhajasva mābhitaptasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,53.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3153: neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,53.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3154: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu /
GE09ram_03pu:3155: ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet // Ram_3,53.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3158: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava /
GE09ram_03pu:3159: yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha // Ram_3,53.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3160: darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:3161: kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ // Ram_3,53.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3162: na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3163: dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām // Ram_3,53.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3164: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:3165: vikrameṇa nayed yas tvāṃ madbāhuparipālitām // Ram_3,53.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3166: laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya /
GE09ram_03pu:3167: abhiṣekodakaklinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām // Ram_3,53.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3168: duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam /
GE09ram_03pu:3169: yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi // Ram_3,53.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3171: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha // Ram_3,53.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3172: puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me /
GE09ram_03pu:3173: vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam // Ram_3,53.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3174: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:3176: śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:3177: alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopakṛtena te // Ram_3,53.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3179: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau // Ram_3,53.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:3180: prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te /
GE09ram_03pu:3181: nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ // Ram_3,53.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:3182: na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃcin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha /
GE09ram_03pu:3183: evam uktvā daśagrīvo maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:3185: sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā /
GE09ram_03pu:3186: tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_3,54.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3188: satyasaṃdhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,54.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3189: rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3190: dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama // Ram_3,54.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3192: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇān hariṣyati // Ram_3,54.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3193: pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:3194: śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ // Ram_3,54.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3195: ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3196: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā // Ram_3,54.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3199: asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3200: utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase // Ram_3,54.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3202: paśor yūpagatasyeva jīvitaṃ tava durlabham // Ram_3,54.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3203: yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:3204: rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam // Ram_3,54.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3205: yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā /
GE09ram_03pu:3206: sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha // Ram_3,54.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3209: na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:3210: yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt // Ram_3,54.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3211: sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3212: nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake // Ram_3,54.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3213: sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham /
GE09ram_03pu:3216: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,54.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3217: māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rākṣasādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:3218: ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca // Ram_3,54.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3221: idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā /
GE09ram_03pu:3222: nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:3223: na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,54.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3224: evam uktvā tu vaidehī krodhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3225: rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_3,54.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3227: pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,54.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3228: śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini /
GE09ram_03pu:3230: tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ // Ram_3,54.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3231: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3232: rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,54.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3233: śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3235: vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3237: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3238: pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,54.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3240: tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham yuṣmābhiḥ parivāritā // Ram_3,54.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3241: tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3242: ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva // Ram_3,54.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3244: aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām // Ram_3,54.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3248: rākṣasīvaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā // Ram_3,54.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3249: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā /
GE09ram_03pu:3250: patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā //
GE09ram_03pu:3252: nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata // Ram_3,55.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3255: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:3257: aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:3258: svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā // Ram_3,55.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3259: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam /
GE09ram_03pu:3260: vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi // Ram_3,55.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3261: sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3262: tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati // Ram_3,55.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3263: rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3264: kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām // Ram_3,55.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3265: dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3266: hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,55.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3267: api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane /
GE09ram_03pu:3269: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca // Ram_3,55.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3270: ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:3274: savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān // Ram_3,55.11 //
