GE09ram_03pu:3276: tato lakṣmaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham // Ram_3,55.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3278: viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā // Ram_3,55.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3279: saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jyeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:3280: vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite // Ram_3,55.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3281: gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3282: uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat // Ram_3,55.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3283: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām /
GE09ram_03pu:3284: sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti // Ram_3,55.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3285: na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:3286: vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpi rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ // Ram_3,55.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3287: aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me /
GE09ram_03pu:3288: api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe // Ram_3,55.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3289: idaṃ hi rakṣo mṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam /
GE09ram_03pu:3290: hataṃ kathaṃcin mahatā śrameṇa sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva //
GE09ram_03pu:3291: manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram /
GE09ram_03pu:3292: asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā // Ram_3,55.20
GE09ram_03pu:3293: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3294: paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā // Ram_3,56.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3295: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha /
GE09ram_03pu:3296: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,56.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3298: kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,56.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3299: yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum /
GE09ram_03pu:3300: kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā // Ram_3,56.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3301: patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3302: vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,56.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3303: kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama /
GE09ram_03pu:3304: kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3305: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi /
GE09ram_03pu:3306: kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3308: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccit saumya na kaikayīm // Ram_3,56.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3309: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3310: suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3312: punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3313: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā /
GE09ram_03pu:3314: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī // Ram_3,56.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3315: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:3316: madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ // Ram_3,56.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3318: vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam // Ram_3,56.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3319: śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama /
GE09ram_03pu:3320: trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ // Ram_3,56.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3321: sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane /
GE09ram_03pu:3322: pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram // Ram_3,56.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3324: taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,56.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3326: kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam // Ram_3,56.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3327: iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3329: vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3330: viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam //
GE09ram_03pu:3331: svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃścit /
GE09ram_03pu:3332: etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva // Ram_3,56.20
GE09ram_03pu:3334: paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,57.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3335: tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3336: yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane virahitā mayā // Ram_3,57.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3337: dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3338: śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_3,57.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3339: sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me /
GE09ram_03pu:3340: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi // Ram_3,57.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3341: evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3342: bhūyo duḥkhasamāviṣṭo duḥkhitaṃ rāmam abravīt // Ram_3,57.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3343: na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3345: āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3346: paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam // Ram_3,57.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3347: sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī /
GE09ram_03pu:3348: gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā // Ram_3,57.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3350: pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idaṃ tvatpratyayānvitam // Ram_3,57.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3351: na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet /
GE09ram_03pu:3352: nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam // Ram_3,57.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3353: vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati /
GE09ram_03pu:3354: trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api // Ram_3,57.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3355: kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram /
GE09ram_03pu:3356: visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:3357: na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārījanasevitā // Ram_3,57.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3358: alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā /
GE09ram_03pu:3359: na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:3360: jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet // Ram_3,57.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3362: uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,57.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3363: bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3364: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,57.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3366: krośantaṃ hi yathātyarthaṃ nainam abhyavapadyase // Ram_3,57.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3369: evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3372: abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,57.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3373: jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:3374: anena krodhavākyena maithilyā niḥsṛto bhavān // Ram_3,57.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3375: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3376: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,57.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3377: sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3378: krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama // Ram_3,57.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3379: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3381: vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ salīlabāṇena ca tāḍito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3382: mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:3383: śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam /
GE09ram_03pu:3384: udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm //
GE09ram_03pu:3386: prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate // Ram_3,58.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3388: api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,58.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3393: dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:3394: śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva // Ram_3,58.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3398: dṛṣṭvā śūnyoṭajasthānaṃ vilalāpa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,58.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3399: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:3400: nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā // Ram_3,58.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3401: gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3402: atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā // Ram_3,58.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3403: yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām /
GE09ram_03pu:3404: śokaraktekṣaṇaḥ śokād unmatta iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,58.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3405: vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3407: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā /
GE09ram_03pu:3408: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām // Ram_3,58.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3410: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī // Ram_3,58.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3411: atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām /
GE09ram_03pu:3412: janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā // Ram_3,58.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3413: kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3414: latāpallavapuṣpāḍhyo bhāti hy eṣa vanaspatiḥ // Ram_3,58.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3415: bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam /
GE09ram_03pu:3416: eṣa vyaktaṃ vijānāti tilakas tilakapriyām // Ram_3,58.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3418: tvannāmānaṃ kuru kṣipraṃ priyāsaṃdarśanena mām // Ram_3,58.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3420: kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṇyaṃ yadi te mayi // Ram_3,58.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3421: yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambu jāmbūnadaprabhā /
GE09ram_03pu:3422: priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me // Ram_3,58.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3423: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3424: mṛgaviprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet // Ram_3,58.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3425: gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:3426: tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa // Ram_3,58.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3427: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā /
GE09ram_03pu:3428: maithilī mama viśrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam // Ram_3,58.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3429: kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:3430: vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase // Ram_3,58.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3431: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi /
GE09ram_03pu:3432: nātyarthaṃ hāsyaśīlāsi kimarthaṃ mām upekṣase // Ram_3,58.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3434: dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam // Ram_3,58.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3435: naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī /
GE09ram_03pu:3436: kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati // Ram_3,58.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3437: vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3438: vibhajyāṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā // Ram_3,58.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3439: nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam /
GE09ram_03pu:3440: sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveyaśobhitā // Ram_3,58.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3441: komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā /
GE09ram_03pu:3442: nūnaṃ vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallavakomalau // Ram_3,58.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3444: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai // Ram_3,58.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:3446: hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kvacit // Ram_3,58.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3447: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3448: ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam // Ram_3,58.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:3449: kvacid udbhramate vegāt kvacid vibhramate balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:3451: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3452: kānanāni ca vegena bhramaty aparisaṃsthitaḥ // Ram_3,58.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:3453: tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_03pu:3454: aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ pariśramam //
GE09ram_03pu:3456: rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca // Ram_3,59.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3457: adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3458: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau // Ram_3,59.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3459: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā /
GE09ram_03pu:3460: kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā // Ram_3,59.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3461: vṛkṣeṇācchādya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3462: alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam // Ram_3,59.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3463: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3464: ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ // Ram_3,59.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3466: paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3467: kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3468: apūrayitvā taṃ kālaṃ matsakāśam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,59.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3469: kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3470: dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3472: mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum // Ram_3,59.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3473: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame /
GE09ram_03pu:3474: tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,59.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3476: na dadarśa suduḥkhārto rāghavo janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3478: paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram /
GE09ram_03pu:3479: lakṣmaṇo rāmam atyartham uvāca hitakāmyayā // Ram_3,59.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3480: mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:3481: idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam // Ram_3,59.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3483: sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām // Ram_3,59.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3485: vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kvacit /
GE09ram_03pu:3486: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha // Ram_3,59.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3487: tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe /
GE09ram_03pu:3488: vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:3489: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_3,59.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3490: evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3492: tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca // Ram_3,59.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3494: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca // Ram_3,59.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3496: vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,59.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3497: neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe /
GE09ram_03pu:3498: tato duḥkhābhisaṃtapto lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,59.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3500: prāpsyasi tvaṃ mahāprājña maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3501: yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām /
GE09ram_03pu:3502: evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,59.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3504: vanaṃ sarvaṃ suvicitaṃ padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ // Ram_3,59.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3506: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm // Ram_3,59.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3511: bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3512: hā priyeti vicukrośa bahuśo bāṣpagadgadaḥ // Ram_3,59.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3516: apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,59.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3517: sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:3518: śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3519: api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā // Ram_3,60.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3520: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi /
GE09ram_03pu:3521: nadīṃ godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ jagāma laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,60.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3522: tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:3523: naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me // Ram_3,60.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3524: kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:3525: na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,60.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3527: rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,60.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3528: sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt // Ram_3,60.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3530: na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,60.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3531: tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:3532: na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā // Ram_3,60.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3533: rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3534: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām // Ram_3,60.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3535: nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3537: kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3538: mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam // Ram_3,60.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3539: yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3540: sarvaṃ vyapanayacchokam vaidehī kva nu sā gatā // Ram_3,60.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3542: manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ // Ram_3,60.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3544: sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate // Ram_3,60.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3545: evaṃ sambhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau /
GE09ram_03pu:3547: tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale /
GE09ram_03pu:3548: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,60.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3550: apinaddhāni vaidehyā mayā dattāni kānane // Ram_3,60.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3552: kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,60.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3553: tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata /
GE09ram_03pu:3554: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // Ram_3,60.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3557: imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3558: yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām // Ram_3,60.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3559: evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:3560: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat // Ram_3,60.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3561: sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3562: saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam // Ram_3,60.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3564: bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_3,60.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3566: āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam // Ram_3,60.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3568: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,60.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3570: babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha // Ram_3,60.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3572: dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,60.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3574: viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam // Ram_3,60.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3576: bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam // Ram_3,60.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:3578: bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe // Ram_3,60.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3580: apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,60.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:3585: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī /
GE09ram_03pu:3586: na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,60.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:3587: bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3588: ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.36 //
GE09ram_03pu:3592: nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.38 //
GE09ram_03pu:3593: māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3595: saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,60.39 //
GE09ram_03pu:3596: naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3597: kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.40 //
GE09ram_03pu:3599: niḥsampātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām // Ram_3,60.41 //
GE09ram_03pu:3604: na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3605: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam // Ram_3,60.44 //
GE09ram_03pu:3607: mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram // Ram_3,60.45 //
GE09ram_03pu:3609: samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.46 //
GE09ram_03pu:3613: drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām // Ram_3,60.48 //
GE09ram_03pu:3614: naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3615: bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite // Ram_3,60.49 //
GE09ram_03pu:3618: nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,60.50 //
GE09ram_03pu:3619: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathā kālo yathā vidhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3621: tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam // Ram_3,60.51 //
GE09ram_03pu:3622: pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3625: lokānām abhave yuktaṃ saṃvartakam ivānalam // Ram_3,61.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3626: vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3627: hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā // Ram_3,61.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3628: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3629: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,61.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3630: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3631: na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_3,61.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3632: candre lakṣmīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā /
GE09ram_03pu:3633: etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ // Ram_3,61.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3634: na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3635: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_3,61.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3638: ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:3639: na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam // Ram_3,61.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3640: naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3641: yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ // Ram_3,61.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3642: sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3643: ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava // Ram_3,61.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3645: nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ // Ram_3,61.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3646: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3648: samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3649: guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha // Ram_3,61.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3652: na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3653: kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,61.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3654: śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra /
GE09ram_03pu:3658: tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3660: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:3662: tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3663: rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam // Ram_3,62.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3664: yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase /
GE09ram_03pu:3665: prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati // Ram_3,62.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3666: duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate /
GE09ram_03pu:3667: ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim // Ram_3,62.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3669: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat // Ram_3,62.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3670: maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3671: ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam // Ram_3,62.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3672: yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:3673: asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava // Ram_3,62.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3674: yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3676: sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:3677: na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ // Ram_3,62.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3679: śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi // Ram_3,62.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3680: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha /
GE09ram_03pu:3681: śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā // Ram_3,62.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3682: tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3685: buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe // Ram_3,62.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3687: nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,62.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3688: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuśo 'nvaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3689: anuśiṣyāddhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_3,62.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3690: buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3691: śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham // Ram_3,62.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3692: divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam /
GE09ram_03pu:3695: tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi // Ram_3,62.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3699: avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,63.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3700: kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3701: kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya // Ram_3,63.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3702: taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:3703: idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_3,63.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3705: santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca // Ram_3,63.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3707: āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca // Ram_3,63.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3708: tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:3711: ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,63.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3712: kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:3715: taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:3716: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,63.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3717: gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:3719: enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // Ram_3,63.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3720: ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:3721: kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,63.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3722: taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman /
GE09ram_03pu:3723: abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // Ram_3,63.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3725: sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam // Ram_3,63.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3726: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3727: hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,63.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3728: sītām abhyavapanno 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3730: etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:3731: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,63.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3732: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3734: rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvaṃ na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,63.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3735: rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām /
GE09ram_03pu:3738: samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // Ram_3,63.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3739: rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3740: īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam // Ram_3,63.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3741: sampūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim /
GE09ram_03pu:3742: so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_3,63.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3744: yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā // Ram_3,63.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3746: śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt // Ram_3,63.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3747: ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3748: jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan // Ram_3,63.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3749: nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3750: kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau // Ram_3,63.26
GE09ram_03pu:3751: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3752: saumitriṃ mitrasampannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,64.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3754: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān // Ram_3,64.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3755: ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate /
GE09ram_03pu:3757: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3758: sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ // Ram_3,64.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3759: kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3760: aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā // Ram_3,64.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3761: kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam /
GE09ram_03pu:3762: sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama // Ram_3,64.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3763: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3764: kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ // Ram_3,64.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3766: vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,64.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3769: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3770: sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // Ram_3,64.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3771: uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3773: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3774: vipraṇaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tatsvāmī pratipadyate // Ram_3,64.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3775: vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat /
GE09ram_03pu:3776: jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati // Ram_3,64.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3777: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati /
GE09ram_03pu:3778: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe // Ram_3,64.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3780: āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam // Ram_3,64.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3781: putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:3782: ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3784: tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasam // Ram_3,64.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:3785: sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:3786: vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_3,64.18 //
GE09ram_03pu:3787: taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam /
GE09ram_03pu:3788: rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,64.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3789: bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:3790: anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,64.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3792: so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ // Ram_3,64.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3793: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me /
GE09ram_03pu:3794: sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,64.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3796: mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3798: śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api // Ram_3,64.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3799: sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:3800: yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa // Ram_3,64.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3801: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3802: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3804: gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam // Ram_3,64.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3806: imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā // Ram_3,64.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3807: yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3808: aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām // Ram_3,64.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3809: mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān /
GE09ram_03pu:3810: gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja // Ram_3,64.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:3811: evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:3812: dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_3,64.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3813: rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:3814: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam // Ram_3,64.32 //
GE09ram_03pu:3816: śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale // Ram_3,64.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:3817: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3818: tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha // Ram_3,64.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:3820: udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau // Ram_3,64.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:3821: sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3822: maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām //
GE09ram_03pu:3823: kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:3824: avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam // Ram_3,65.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3827: gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3828: āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,65.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3829: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
GE09ram_03pu:3830: subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3831: tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau /
GE09ram_03pu:3832: krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau // Ram_3,65.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:3834: nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam // Ram_3,65.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3835: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3837: lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3838: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,65.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3839: spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3840: prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye // Ram_3,65.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3841: tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3842: mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti sambhramam // Ram_3,65.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3844: āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati // Ram_3,65.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3845: tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā /
GE09ram_03pu:3846: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,65.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3848: vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva // Ram_3,65.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3849: taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3851: āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:3852: vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham // Ram_3,65.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3859: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau /
GE09ram_03pu:3860: karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛkṣān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān // Ram_3,65.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3862: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ // Ram_3,65.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3864: mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam // Ram_3,65.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3865: sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau /
GE09ram_03pu:3866: jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt // Ram_3,65.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3868: bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3871: ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau /
GE09ram_03pu:3872: vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām // Ram_3,65.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3875: mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,65.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3877: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,65.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3879: vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām // Ram_3,65.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3881: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau /
GE09ram_03pu:3883: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire /
GE09ram_03pu:3885: iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:3886: avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot //
GE09ram_03pu:3887: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:3889: tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau /
GE09ram_03pu:3890: āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau // Ram_3,66.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3891: tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:3893: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3894: tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahai gurū // Ram_3,66.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3895: tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau /
GE09ram_03pu:3897: dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3898: cicheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,66.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3900: khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā // Ram_3,66.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3902: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ // Ram_3,66.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3904: śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,66.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3905: ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3906: asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,66.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3908: rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau // Ram_3,66.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3909: tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane /
GE09ram_03pu:3911: evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3912: uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran // Ram_3,66.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3913: svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham /
GE09ram_03pu:3914: diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau // Ram_3,66.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:3915: virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:3916: tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava // Ram_3,66.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3918: rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:3919: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ // Ram_3,67.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:3920: so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_03pu:3921: ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ // Ram_3,67.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3922: tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:3923: saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ // Ram_3,67.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3925: etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam // Ram_3,67.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3926: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti /
GE09ram_03pu:3928: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane /
GE09ram_03pu:3929: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham // Ram_3,67.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3930: śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:3931: indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire // Ram_3,67.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3933: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat // Ram_3,67.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:3934: dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:3935: ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam // Ram_3,67.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3937: sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam // Ram_3,67.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:3938: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam /
GE09ram_03pu:3939: pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt // Ram_3,67.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:3941: vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum // Ram_3,67.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:3942: evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau /
GE09ram_03pu:3943: prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat // Ram_3,67.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:3946: sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3947: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,67.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:3948: sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3949: śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā // Ram_3,67.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:3952: evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3954: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_03pu:3955: niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham // Ram_3,67.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:3956: nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3957: nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe // Ram_3,67.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:3959: kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām // Ram_3,67.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:3960: kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3961: bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite // Ram_3,67.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:3962: sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:3963: kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,67.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:3964: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam /
GE09ram_03pu:3965: provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam // Ram_3,67.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:3966: divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:3967: yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,67.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:3968: adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho /
GE09ram_03pu:3969: rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava // Ram_3,67.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:3970: vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3971: svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam // Ram_3,67.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:3972: kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3973: tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi // Ram_3,67.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:3975: vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasam // Ram_3,67.29 //
GE09ram_03pu:3976: tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3977: kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,67.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:3978: na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:3979: sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare // Ram_3,67.31 //
GE09ram_03pu:3980: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau /
GE09ram_03pu:3983: citām ādīpayāmāsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ // Ram_3,68.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:3985: medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ // Ram_3,68.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:3986: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:3987: araje vāsasī bibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,68.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:3991: prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan // Ram_3,68.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:3993: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,68.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:3994: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate /
GE09ram_03pu:3997: yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam // Ram_3,68.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:3998: tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:3999: akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan // Ram_3,68.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:4000: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4001: bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā // Ram_3,68.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:4003: nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,68.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:4004: vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:4006: na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4007: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān // Ram_3,68.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:4008: śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:4009: kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati // Ram_3,68.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:4010: sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4013: kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam // Ram_3,68.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:4014: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4016: na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃcid asti hi rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:4017: yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama // Ram_3,68.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:4018: sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān /
GE09ram_03pu:4019: anviṣya vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ patnīṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati // Ram_3,68.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:4021: diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm // Ram_3,68.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:4022: sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām /
GE09ram_03pu:4023: plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati //
GE09ram_03pu:4025: vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,69.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:4026: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4027: pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ // Ram_3,69.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:4029: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ // Ram_3,69.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:4030: tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:4032: caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:4033: tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.5 //
GE09ram_03pu:4036: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:4039: ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:4040: rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:4041: pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān // Ram_3,69.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:4043: tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ sampradāsyati // Ram_3,69.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:4044: bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye /
GE09ram_03pu:4045: padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam // Ram_3,69.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:4049: apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4050: rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama // Ram_3,69.13 //
GE09ram_03pu:4052: śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi // Ram_3,69.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:4054: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava // Ram_3,69.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:4055: na tāni kaścin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4058: ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ // Ram_3,69.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:4059: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:4062: śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī // Ram_3,69.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:4063: tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:4064: dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // Ram_3,69.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:4065: tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam /
GE09ram_03pu:4066: āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi // Ram_3,69.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:4067: na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam /
GE09ram_03pu:4068: ṛṣes tasya mataṃgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam // Ram_3,69.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:4073: udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ // Ram_3,69.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:4074: śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani /
GE09ram_03pu:4075: yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati // Ram_3,69.25 //
GE09ram_03pu:4077: tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,69.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:4081: pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ // Ram_3,69.28 //
GE09ram_03pu:4082: te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam /
GE09ram_03pu:4084: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā /
GE09ram_03pu:4085: śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam // Ram_3,69.30 //
GE09ram_03pu:4086: tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4088: tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4090: kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:4091: sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān // Ram_3,69.33 //
GE09ram_03pu:4092: taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:4093: prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt // Ram_3,69.34 //
GE09ram_03pu:4094: gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4095: suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā // Ram_3,69.35 //
GE09ram_03pu:4096: sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4097: nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca //
GE09ram_03pu:4098: tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:4099: ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau // Ram_3,70.1 //
GE09ram_03pu:4101: vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,70.2 //
GE09ram_03pu:4102: kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau /
GE09ram_03pu:4103: pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ // Ram_3,70.3 //
GE09ram_03pu:4104: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam /
GE09ram_03pu:4105: apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam // Ram_3,70.4 //
GE09ram_03pu:4106: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:4108: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4109: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,70.6 //
GE09ram_03pu:4110: tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām /
GE09ram_03pu:4111: kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ // Ram_3,70.7 //
GE09ram_03pu:4112: kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane /
GE09ram_03pu:4113: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:4114: kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi // Ram_3,70.8 //
GE09ram_03pu:4115: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā /
GE09ram_03pu:4116: śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā // Ram_3,70.9 //
GE09ram_03pu:4118: itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam // Ram_3,70.10 //
GE09ram_03pu:4119: taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4120: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam // Ram_3,70.11 //
GE09ram_03pu:4122: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,70.12 //
GE09ram_03pu:4123: mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:4125: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam /
GE09ram_03pu:4126: rāghavaḥ prāha vijāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām // Ram_3,70.14 //
GE09ram_03pu:4127: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4128: śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase // Ram_3,70.15 //
GE09ram_03pu:4129: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:4130: śabarī darśayāmāsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,70.16 //
GE09ram_03pu:4132: mataṃgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana // Ram_3,70.17 //
GE09ram_03pu:4133: iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute /
GE09ram_03pu:4135: iyaṃ pratyaksthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4136: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ // Ram_3,70.19 //
GE09ram_03pu:4138: dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,70.20 //
GE09ram_03pu:4140: cintite 'bhyāgatān paśya sametān sapta sāgarān // Ram_3,70.21 //
GE09ram_03pu:4141: kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha /
GE09ram_03pu:4142: adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana // Ram_3,70.22 //
GE09ram_03pu:4143: kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:4144: tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram // Ram_3,70.23 //
GE09ram_03pu:4145: teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:4146: munīnām āśramo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī // Ram_3,70.24 //
GE09ram_03pu:4147: dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4150: jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā // Ram_3,70.26 //
GE09ram_03pu:4152: tat puṇyaṃ śabarī sthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā // Ram_3,70.27 //
GE09ram_03pu:4153: divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:4154: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayāmāsa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,71. 1 //
GE09ram_03pu:4155: cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:4159: saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:4160: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ // Ram_3,71. 4 //
GE09ram_03pu:4161: pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:4162: tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa samprati // Ram_3,71. 5 //
GE09ram_03pu:4164: tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām // Ram_3,71. 6 //
GE09ram_03pu:4167: nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,71. 7 //
GE09ram_03pu:4168: abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham /
GE09ram_03pu:4169: tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam // Ram_3,71. 8 //
GE09ram_03pu:4170: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:4171: gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ // Ram_3,71. 9 //
GE09ram_03pu:4172: āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4173: ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ // Ram_3,71. 10 //
GE09ram_03pu:4176: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,71. 11 //
GE09ram_03pu:4177: sa rāmo vividhān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:4178: paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam // Ram_3,71. 12 //
GE09ram_03pu:4179: sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:4182: viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām // Ram_3,71. 14 //
GE09ram_03pu:4191: nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva // Ram_3,71. 18 //
GE09ram_03pu:4194: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:4195: vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,71. 20 //
GE09ram_03pu:4196: tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:4197: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,71. 21 //
GE09ram_03pu:4200: anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām // Ram_3,71. 22 //
GE09ram_03pu:4201: asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:4204: adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ // Ram_3,71. 24 //
GE09ram_03pu:4206: ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam // Ram_3,71. 25 //
GE09ram_03pu:4207: tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam /
